reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was a bit small but served the purpose. The walls were a bit dirty but overall the room was clean. I found the beds comfortable and the bed linen was clean and changed daily. The breakfast was a bit spartan. The location was decent. About a 10 minute walk to the U-Bahn. Some good restaurants nearby.
reviews.title: Good for a short stay

reviews.text: The shower appeared to be put in backwards so the drain was always getting blocked by the shower curtain and filling with water. Plenty of hot water. No air but the room does come with a fan which was sufficient to allow you to get a decent nights sleep. The window opens wide for fresh air. The hotel also offer free parking.
reviews.title: I expected more

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This pension was not bad but not perfect at all as reviews said.
reviews.title: Excellent location, friendly, quiet
Lovely place
reviews.text: Very friendly reception. Good breakfast served with care.
I chose this hotel because it was close to Westbahnhof railway station; it is not the city center though there is a shopping street Mariahilferstrasse near which leads to Ring.
reviews.title: No Complants-None!
